entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Princeton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:27 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Princeton Airport 9:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -13.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -15.8°C
Wind: NW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets or freezing rain in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
